column4: hi is there any difference between normal, atlternate and minimal install. from what i understand they are just different ways to install, but the resulting system will be the same (leaving different package choices aside). is that correct? or do they have different default settings, different dirvers or different kernels?
you cannot ask that question and leave different package choices aside
my question is, if i will get the same system after all, if i install the same packages. i want to know if there are "deeper" differences.
thank. that was what i wanted to know
